welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kirkby in Ashfield, a charming town located in the heart of the beautiful United Kingdom. Known for its historic landmarks and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience all that our wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at East Midlands Airport is one of the largest in the UK and handles a variety of goods and products.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is designated for military use only.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.
